title: How to Hook Up a PlayStation 4 to a TV

steps.title: Locate the HDMI out port on the back of the console.
steps.content: Locate the HDMI out port on the back of the console.

steps.title: Plug in an HDMI cable into the HDMI port on the PlayStation 4.
steps.content: Plug in an HDMI cable into the HDMI port on the PlayStation 4.

steps.title: Locate an HDMI in port on your television.
steps.content: Locate an HDMI in port on your television. Plug the other end of the HDMI cable in.

steps.title: Plug in the power for the PlayStation console.
steps.content: Plug in the power for the PlayStation console. Turn on the console.

steps.title: Switch the TV to the input source your PlayStation 4 is running to.
steps.content: Switch the TV to the input source your PlayStation 4 is running to. The button for this is often labeled "Source" or "Input" on your TV remote. Once you pick the right source, you should see the PS4 screen pop up.
